definitions: To place a dead body in the ground or a tomb.
To put something under the ground or cover it with earth, stones, or other material.
To involve oneself deeply in something.
To defeat an opponent decisively in a game or contest.
examples: He decided to bury his face in his hands.
The team will bury their opponents.
She likes to bury herself in her work.
The dog will bury its bone.
